verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH3947> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> with him <WH899>, and the garments, and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and a bullock <WH6499> for the sin offering <WH2403>, and two <WH8147> rams <WH352>, and a basket <WH5536> of unleavened bread <WH4682>;
And gather <WH6950> you all the congregation <WH5712> together <WH6950> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him <WH5712>; and the assembly was gathered together <WH6950> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the congregation <WH5712>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to be done <WH6213>.
And Moses <WH4872> brought <WH7126> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and washed <WH7364> them with water <WH4325>.

And he put <WH5414> upon him the coat <WH3801>, and girded <WH2296> him with the belt <WH73>, and clothed <WH3847> him with the robe <WH4598>, and put <WH5414> the ephod <WH646> upon him <WH2296>, and he girded him with the curious belt <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>, and bound it unto him with it <WH640>.
And he put <WH7760> the breastplate <WH2833> upon him <WH5414>: also he put in the breastplate <WH2833> the Urim <WH224> and the Thummim <WH8550>.

And he put <WH7760> the turban <WH4701> upon his head <WH7218>; also upon the turban <WH4701>, even upon his forefront <WH6440>, did he put <WH7760> the golden <WH2091> plate <WH6731>, the holy <WH6944> crown <WH5145>; as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and anointed <WH4886> the tabernacle <WH4908> and all that was in it <WH6942>, and sanctified them.

And he sprinkled <WH5137> there upon the altar <WH4196> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>, and anointed <WH4886> the altar <WH4196> and all his vessels <WH3627>, both the basin <WH3595> and his foot <WH3653>, to sanctify them <WH6942>.
And he poured <WH3332> of the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> upon Aaron <WH175>'s head <WH7218>, and anointed <WH4886> him <WH6942>, to sanctify him.

And Moses <WH4872> brought <WH7126> Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, and put <WH3847> coats <WH3801> upon them <WH2296>, and girded them with belts <WH73>, and put <WH2280> caps <WH4021> upon them <WH3068>; as the Lord commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And he brought <WH5066> the bullock <WH6499> for the sin offering <WH2403>: and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> laid <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the bullock <WH6499> for the sin offering <WH2403>.

And he killed <WH7819> it <WH4872>; and Moses took <WH3947> the blood <WH1818>, and put <WH5414> it upon the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439> with his finger <WH676>, and purified <WH2398> the altar <WH4196>, and poured <WH3332> the blood <WH1818> at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>, and sanctified <WH6942> it <WH3722>, to make reconciliation upon it.

And he took <WH3947> all the fat <WH2459> that was upon the innards <WH7130>, and the membrane <WH3508> above the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and their fat <WH2459>, and Moses <WH4872> burned <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196>.

But the bullock <WH6499>, and his hide <WH5785>, his flesh <WH1320>, and his dung <WH6569>, he burnt <WH8313> with fire <WH784> outside <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>; as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And he brought <WH7126> the ram <WH352> for the burnt offering <WH5930>: and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> laid <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.
And he killed <WH7819> it <WH4872>; and Moses sprinkled <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.
And he cut <WH5408> the ram <WH352> into pieces <WH5409>; and Moses <WH4872> burnt <WH6999> the head <WH7218>, and the pieces <WH5409>, and the fat <WH6309>.

And he washed <WH7364> the innards <WH7130> and the legs <WH3767> in water <WH4325>; and Moses <WH4872> burnt <WH6999> the whole ram <WH352> upon the altar <WH4196>: it was a burnt sacrifice <WH5930> for a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381>, and an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>; as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And he brought <WH7126> the other <WH8145> ram <WH352>, the ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>: and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> laid <WH5564> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.

And he killed <WH7819> it <WH4872>; and Moses took <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818> of it <WH5414>, and put it upon the tip <WH8571> of Aaron <WH175>'s right <WH3233> ear <WH241>, and upon the thumb <WH931> of his right <WH3233> hand <WH3027>, and upon the great toe <WH931> of his right <WH3233> foot <WH7272>.

And he brought <WH7126> Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, and Moses <WH4872> put <WH5414> of the blood <WH1818> upon the tip <WH8571> of their right <WH3233> ear <WH241>, and upon the thumbs <WH931> of their right <WH3233> hands <WH3027>, and upon the great toes <WH931> of their right <WH3233> feet <WH7272>: and Moses <WH4872> sprinkled <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.

And he took <WH3947> the fat <WH2459>, and the rump <WH451>, and all the fat <WH2459> that was upon the innards <WH7130>, and the membrane <WH3508> above the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and their fat <WH2459>, and the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785>:

And out of the basket <WH5536> of unleavened <WH4682> bread <WH3899>, that was before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, he took <WH3947> one <WH259> unleavened <WH4682> cake <WH2471>, and a cake <WH2471> of oiled <WH8081> bread <WH259>, and one wafer <WH7550>, and put <WH7760> them on the fat <WH2459>, and upon the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785>:
And he put <WH5414> all upon Aaron <WH175>'s hands <WH3709>, and upon his sons <WH1121>' hands <WH3709>, and waved <WH5130> them for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> them from off their hands <WH3709>, and burnt <WH6999> them on the altar <WH4196> upon the burnt offering <WH5930>: they were consecrations <WH4394> for a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381>: it is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the breast <WH2373>, and waved <WH5130> it for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: for of the ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394> it was Moses <WH4872>' part <WH4490>; as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> of the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and of the blood <WH1818> which was upon the altar <WH4196>, and sprinkled <WH5137> it upon Aaron <WH175>, and upon his garments <WH899>, and upon his sons <WH1121>, and upon his sons <WH1121>' garments <WH899> with him <WH6942>; and sanctified Aaron <WH175>, and his garments <WH899>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his sons <WH1121>' garments with him <WH899>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, Boil <WH1310> the flesh <WH1320> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and there eat <WH398> it with the bread <WH3899> that is in the basket <WH5536> of consecrations <WH4394>, as I commanded <WH6680>, saying <WH559>, Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall eat it <WH398>.
And that which remains <WH3498> of the flesh <WH1320> and of the bread <WH3899> shall you burn <WH8313> with fire <WH784>.

And you shall not go out <WH3318> of the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> in seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, until the days <WH3117> of your consecration <WH4394> be at an end <WH4390>: for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall he consecrate you <WH4390>.
As he has done <WH6213> this day <WH3117>, so the Lord <WH3068> has commanded <WH6680> to do <WH6213>, to make an atonement for you <WH3722>.

Therefore shall you stay <WH3427> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, and keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the Lord <WH3068>, that you die <WH4191> not <WH6680>: for so I am commanded.
So Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> did <WH6213> all things <WH1697> which the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.
